cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's chi

sentence.kanji: 彼はその地で残りの生涯を過ごしたんだ。
sentence.romaji: kare ha sono chi de nokori no shougai wo sugoshita n da
sentence.english: He spent the rest of his life in that place.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's keikoutou

sentence.kanji: 古い蛍光灯を取り替えてください。
sentence.romaji: furui keikoutou wo torikaete kudasai
sentence.english: Please change the old fluorescent light.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's houtai

sentence.kanji: 彼女は手に包帯を巻いていたんだ。
sentence.romaji: kanojo ha te ni houtai wo maite ita n da
sentence.english: Her hand was wrapped in a bandage.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's furoba

sentence.kanji: 私は風呂場で歯を磨きます。
sentence.romaji: watashi ha furoba de ha wo migakimasu
sentence.english: I brush my teeth in the bathroom.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's chouchou

sentence.kanji: 見て、きれいな蝶蝶が飛んでいる。
sentence.romaji: mite 、 kirei na chouchou ga ton deiru 。
sentence.english: Look, there's a beautiful butterfly flying.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kame

sentence.kanji: この池には亀がいますね。
sentence.romaji: kono ike ni ha kame ga imasu ne
sentence.english: There is a turtle in this pond.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's urayamashii

sentence.kanji: 彼の才能は羨ましい程だね。
sentence.romaji: kare no sainou ha urayamashii hodo da ne
sentence.english: I almost envy his talent.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kuni

sentence.kanji: 私の国について少しお話しましょう。
sentence.romaji: watashi no kuni ni tsuite sukoshi ohanashi shimashou
sentence.english: Let me tell you a bit about my country.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's mise

sentence.kanji: 私はこの店によく来ます。
sentence.romaji: watashi ha kono mise ni yoku kimasu
sentence.english: I come to this store quite often.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's omou

sentence.kanji: 私もそう思います。
sentence.romaji: watashi mo sou omoimasu
sentence.english: I think so too.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's wasureru

sentence.kanji: 約束を忘れないでください。
sentence.romaji: yakusoku wo wasurenai de kudasai
sentence.english: Please don't forget your promise.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's musuko

sentence.kanji: うちの息子は大学1年生です。
sentence.romaji: uchi no musuko ha daigaku ichinensei desu
sentence.english: My son's a college freshman.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kanjiru

sentence.kanji: 膝に痛みを感じます。
sentence.romaji: hiza ni itami wo kanjimasu
sentence.english: I feel a pain in my knee.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's anshin

sentence.kanji: それを聞いて安心しました。
sentence.romaji: sore wo kiite anshin shimashita
sentence.english: I was relieved to hear that.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's nareru

sentence.kanji: 新しい家にはもう慣れましたか。
sentence.romaji: atarashii ie ni ha mou naremashita ka
sentence.english: Have you gotten used to the new house yet?

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shuukan

sentence.kanji: 毎朝コーヒーを飲むのが習慣です。
sentence.romaji: maiasa ko-hi- wo nomu no ga shuukan desu
sentence.english: I'm in the habit of drinking coffee every morning.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's gaikokugo

sentence.kanji: 外国語を習うのは難しい。
sentence.romaji: gaikokugo wo narau no ha muzukashii
sentence.english: Learning foreign languages is hard.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's mawasu

sentence.kanji: ねじは左に回すと外れます。
sentence.romaji: neji ha hidari ni mawasu to hazuremasu
sentence.english: If you turn the screw to the left it will come undone.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kanarazu

sentence.kanji: 必ずシートベルトを着けて下さい。
sentence.romaji: kanarazu shi-toberuto wo tsukete kudasai
sentence.english: Always wear your seat belt.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's zenkoku

sentence.kanji: 次は全国のお天気です。
sentence.romaji: tsugi ha zenkoku no otenki desu
sentence.english: And now for the nation's weather.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's zashi

sentence.kanji: この雑誌はよく売れています。
sentence.romaji: kono zashi ha yoku urete imasu
sentence.english: This magazine sells well.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's baiten

sentence.kanji: 駅の売店で雑誌を買った。
sentence.romaji: eki no baiten de zashi wo kata
sentence.english: I bought a magazine at a shop in the station.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's gaikoku

sentence.kanji: 母はまだ外国に行ったことがありません。
sentence.romaji: haha ha mada gaikoku ni ita koto ga arimasen
sentence.english: My mother hasn't been abroad yet.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tenin

sentence.kanji: あの店員はとても親切です。
sentence.romaji: ano tenin ha totemo shinsetsu desu
sentence.english: That shop clerk is very kind.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's imi

sentence.kanji: それはどういう意味ですか。
sentence.romaji: sore ha douiu imi desu ka
sentence.english: What does that mean?

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's iken

sentence.kanji: あなたの意見が聞きたいです。
sentence.romaji: anata no iken ga kikitai desu
sentence.english: I want to hear your opinion.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's chuui

sentence.kanji: 車に注意してください。
sentence.romaji: kuruma ni chuui shite kudasai
sentence.english: Please watch out for traffic.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kakunin

sentence.kanji: もう一度、予約を確認した。
sentence.romaji: mou ichido yoyaku wo kakunin shita
sentence.english: I confirmed my reservation one more time.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's genin

sentence.kanji: この事故の原因は何ですか。
sentence.romaji: konojiko no genin ha nan desu ka
sentence.english: What's the cause of the accident?

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kakoku

sentence.kanji: 各国の代表がニューヨークに集まった。
sentence.romaji: kakoku no daihyou ga nyu-yo-ku ni atsumata
sentence.english: Each country's representatives assembled in New York.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's mawaru

sentence.kanji: 月は地球のまわりを回っています。
sentence.romaji: tsuki ha chikyuu no mawari wo mawate imasu
sentence.english: The moon spins around the earth.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's chuushin

sentence.kanji: ここが建物の中心です。
sentence.romaji: koko ga tatemono no chuushin desu
sentence.english: This is the center of the building.

cards.english: be at a loss, in a jam, in trouble
cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's komaru

sentence.kanji: ケータイをなくして困っています。
sentence.romaji: ke-tai wo nakushite komate imasu
sentence.english: I'm in a jam because I lost my cell phone.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's katei

sentence.kanji: 彼は家庭を大切にしている。
sentence.romaji: kare ha katei wo taisetsu ni shite iru
sentence.english: He values his family.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's niwa

sentence.kanji: 庭にバラを植えました。
sentence.romaji: niwa ni bara wo uemashita
sentence.english: I planted a rose in the garden.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's katai

sentence.kanji: 私の上司は頭が固い。
sentence.romaji: watashi no joushi ha atama ga katai
sentence.english: My boss is stubborn.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's isogashii

sentence.kanji: 忙しいので手伝ってください。
sentence.romaji: isogashii no de tetsudate kudasai
sentence.english: I have a lot to do, so please help me out.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's osoroshii

sentence.kanji: 昨夜恐ろしい夢を見た。
sentence.romaji: yuube osoroshii yume wo mita
sentence.english: I had a terrible dream last night.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kowai

sentence.kanji: 私は犬が怖いです。
sentence.romaji: watashi ha inu ga kowai desu
sentence.english: I'm scared of dogs.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's yuka

sentence.kanji: 床がぬれている。
sentence.romaji: yuka ga nurete iru
sentence.english: The floor is wet.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's futon

sentence.kanji: 母が布団を干している。
sentence.romaji: haha ga futon wo hoshite iru
sentence.english: My mother is airing the futons.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's migaku

sentence.kanji: 靴を磨いてください。
sentence.romaji: kutsu wo migaite kudasai
sentence.english: Please polish your shoes.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kokudo

sentence.kanji: わが国の国土は70%が森林です。
sentence.romaji: wagakuni no kokudo ha nanajupa-sento ga shinrin desu
sentence.english: 70 % of the countryside in our country is forest.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kokugo

sentence.kanji: 今日の1時間目は国語です。
sentence.romaji: kyou no ichijikanme ha kokugo desu
sentence.english: The first class today is Japanese.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's honten

sentence.kanji: ここはチェーン店の本店です。
sentence.romaji: koko ha chie-nten no honten desu
sentence.english: This is the headquarters of the chain.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shouten

sentence.kanji: この通りには商店が多いね。
sentence.romaji: kono toori ni ha shouten ga ooi ne
sentence.english: There are many shops on this street.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kouriten

sentence.kanji: この商品は小売店でも買えます。
sentence.romaji: kono shouhin ha kouriten de mo kaemasu
sentence.english: This product can be purchased in retail shops.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shoten

sentence.kanji: 駅前に新しい書店ができました。
sentence.romaji: ekimae ni atarashii shoten ga dekimashita
sentence.english: A new bookstore has opened in front of the station.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kokumei

sentence.kanji: アジアの国名をいくつ知っていますか。
sentence.romaji: ajia no kokumei wo ikutsu shite imasu ka
sentence.english: How many country names in Asia do you know?

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's mawarimichi

sentence.kanji: 今日は回り道して帰ろう。
sentence.romaji: kyou ha mawarimichi shite kaerou
sentence.english: Today, let's make a detour on the way home.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's taikoku

sentence.kanji: その国は経済大国よ。
sentence.romaji: sono kuni ha keizai taikoku yo
sentence.english: That country's an economic powerhouse.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's nare

sentence.kanji: 仕事には慣れも必要です。
sentence.romaji: shigoto ni ha nare mo hitsuyou desu
sentence.english: Getting used to the work is also necessary in any job.
